name: Big Boy Simulator (Pheede)
description:
PUZZLE-SIMULATION GAME

Use human sacrifices to lead the giant to the goal. Place apples to move your lil AI units around, which in turn bait the giant. 

Build walls to alter the giant's pathfinding.

Men will chase after women even more than apples. When they get together, they have a baby.

Big Boy Team: Erik Segriff, Ted Poole, Kevin Newman, Calin Ardelean
